title: Rena: How to Succeed in Spite of Life's Challenges
description: Bestselling author Zig Ziglar says it "I have never met anyone like Rena Tarbet or read a book which contained the elements which this one Overcoming seemingly insurmountable obstacles, living with cancer for many years, undergoing extensive treatments, enduring the pain, the inconvenience, the frustrations, and yes, on occasion, the fears and anxieties that attend the dread disease."
author: Rena Tarbet
